properties.description: Copy new and changed files only by using LastModifiedDate

activities.name: For Each CF Then Run Dataflow
ETL merge daily load to historicals
Copy FileName Comma NoH
activities.description: Hace un merge de todos los días y limpia los datos.

activities.name: Copy FileName Comma SkipLine
activities.description: Hace un merge de todos los días y limpia los datos.

activities.name: Copy FileName Thorn NoH
activities.description: Hace un merge de todos los días y limpia los datos.

activities.name: For Each Client Then Run Dataflow
Copy FileName Comma SkipLine 30d
activities.description: Hace un merge de todos los días y limpia los datos.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	client_name as string,
	table_name as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat($client_name,"/",$table_name,".csv"))]) ~> IncrementingFile
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat($client_name,"/Staging_",$table_name,".csv"))]) ~> DailyExtraction
IncrementingFile, DailyExtraction union(byName: true)~> Union
Union sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($table_name,".csv"))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MergedHistoricalData

parameters{
	client_abr as string,
	client_name as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Filename',
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(),-1)),
	wildcardPaths:[(concat( $client_abr ,"-DiskSpace-*.csv"))]) ~> CostControlDiskSpaceI1
source(output(
		col1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Filename',
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(),-1)),
	wildcardPaths:[(concat( $client_abr ,"-DiskSpace-*.csv"))]) ~> CostControlDiskSpaceI2
CostControlDiskSpaceI1 derive(col2 = iif(
    locate(",",col1)>0,
    left(col1,locate(",",col1)),
    col1
),
		{Date modified} = substring(Filename,16,10)) ~> CommaDelimLogsI1
CostControlDiskSpaceI2 derive(col2 = iif(
    locate(",",col1)>0,
    substring(col1,locate(",",col1)+2),
    ""
),
		{Date modified} = substring(Filename,16,10)) ~> CommaDelimLogsI2
CommaDelimLogsI2 split(col2!='',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(DoubleLog, UniqueLog)
ConditionalSplit2@DoubleLog select(mapColumn(
		DiskSpaceColumns = col2,
		{Date modified}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSecondPart
CommaDelimLogsI1 select(mapColumn(
		DiskSpaceColumns = col2,
		{Date modified}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFirstPart
SelectFirstPart, SelectSecondPart union(byName: true)~> Union
Union filter(iif(
    left(DiskSpaceColumns,1)=='@',
    true(),
    iif(
        substring(DiskSpaceColumns,2,1)=='@',
        true(),
        false()
    )
)) ~> OnlyPayloadFilter
OnlyPayloadFilter derive(Computer = left(DiskSpaceColumns,locate(";",DiskSpaceColumns)-1),
		DiskSpace = regexExtract(
    substring(
        DiskSpaceColumns,
        locate(";",DiskSpaceColumns)+2
    ),
    `(\d+\.?\d{0,})`,
    1
)) ~> CompDsDelim
CompDsDelim select(mapColumn(
		{Date modified},
		Computer,
		DiskSpace
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select sink(input(
		{Date modified} as string,
		Computer as string,
		DiskSpace as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Staging_DiskSpace.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CostControlDiskSpaceO

parameters{
	client_abr as string,
	client_name as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Filename',
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(),-1)),
	wildcardPaths:[(concat( $client_abr ,"-StorageAccountPolicy-*.csv"))]) ~> CapacidadStorageAccountPolicyI
CapacidadStorageAccountPolicyI derive(StorageAccountName = left(
    col1,
    locate(" ",col1)
),
		RulesAndActive = regexExtract(
    col1,
    " (\\S+ ?\\S+)  ",
    1
),
		RulesStatus = right(col1,2),
		{Date modified} = substring(Filename,27,10)) ~> SpaceDelimFields
SpaceDelimFields select(mapColumn(
		StorageAccountName,
		RulesAndActive,
		RulesStatus,
		{Date modified}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPayload
SelectPayload filter(iif(
    length(StorageAccountName)<1,
    false(),
    iif(
        left(StorageAccountName,1)=='-',
        false(),
        true()
    )
)) ~> OnlyPayloadFilter
OnlyPayloadFilter sink(input(
		StorageAccountName as string,
		RulesAndActive as string,
		{Date modified} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Staging_StorageAccountPolicy.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CapacidadStorageAccountPolicyO

parameters{
	client_name as string,
	client_abr as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(),-1)),
	skipLines: 3,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat( $client_abr ,"-TotalTags-*.csv"))]) ~> GovTotTagsI
GovTotTagsI derive(Resource = rtrim(left(col1,169)),
		Tags = left(substring(col1,170),locate("  ",substring(col1,170))),
		{Date modified} = substring(FileName,16,10)) ~> SplitResourceAndTag
SplitResourceAndTag select(mapColumn(
		{Date modified},
		Tags
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select filter(instr(Tags,',')>0) ~> FilterVoids
InsertRowCount aggregate(groupBy({Date modified},
		Tags),
	NumberOfTags = sum(IsRow)) ~> Aggregate
FilterVoids derive(IsRow = 1) ~> InsertRowCount
Aggregate sink(input(
		{Date modified} as string,
		Tags as string,
		NumberOfTags as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Staging_TotalTags.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GovTotTagsO

parameters{
	client_abr as string,
	client_name as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(),-1)),
	wildcardPaths:[(concat( $client_abr ,"-CostAcumulated-*.csv"))]) ~> CostControlCostAcumulatedI
CostControlCostAcumulatedI derive(InstanceName = left(col1,locate('  ',col1)),
		PretaxCost = regexExtract(col1,'  ([\\d\\.]+)',1),
		Date = regexExtract(FileName,'(\\d{4}-\\d\\d-\\d\\d)',1)) ~> ParsingColumnsContents
ParsingColumnsContents select(mapColumn(
		InstanceName,
		PretaxCost,
		Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPayloadColumns
SelectPayloadColumns filter(length(PretaxCost)>0) ~> FilterPayloadRows
FilterPayloadRows sink(input(
		InstanceName as string,
		PretaxCost as string,
		Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Staging_CostAcumulated.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CostControlCostAcumulatedO
